msContents.summary: This is a manuscript of the Aṣṭādhyāyī. It lists all the rules from the Aṣṭādhyāyī and also includes the supplementary vārtikas on the respective rules with statements turned vārtikas from the VyākaraṇaMahābhāṣya. Some description resembles the Kāśikā, the famous commentary on the Aṣṭādhyāyī, but the wording is not exactly similar.
